Monster ID3164

Flockleader Geerin is one of the Aviansie bodyguards of Kree'arra, along with Flight Kilisa and Wingman Skree. She uses Ranged attacks with a max hit of 25 hitpoints. When fighting Kree'arra, it is very unlikely Flockleader Geerin will do any damage at all, as most players use the Protect from Missiles prayer to defend from Kree'arra.

The ability to be assigned aviansies by Konar quo Maten, Chaeldar, Nieve, and Duradel can be purchased for 80 slayer reward points, which allows the use for the bonuses of the slayer helmet (i).

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Flockleader Geerin has the highest maximum hit of any bodyguard in the God Wars Dungeon.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ 1.0 1.1 1.2 Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 19 January 2016. (Archived from the original on 26 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "It's 1/508 for any shard, 1/1524 for a specific one of the three."
  2. ^ 2.0 2.1 Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 4 January 2019. (Archived from the original on 26 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "That'd be 8/125 of the fish option and 8/125 of the potato option, assuming you didn't get onto the unique / shard loot table."
  3. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 10 May 2015. (Archived from the original on 26 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "The bodyguards drop hards at 1/128."
